channel.title: Spanish on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Spanish on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Smoke.Oil.Salt
item.description: Smoke.Oil.Salt is another one of those many tapas shareable places that has been popping up all over Los Angeles. Unlike the other restaurants I’ve been to in the past few months, this is Spanish style featuring some traditional spanish dishes. It was surprisingly good. This is #23 of 52 of my 2014 LA food expedition. Note for 2022 migration: this is an old post from my other defunct blog. This restaurant unfortunately is now closed.
